scripts.init-appcore: cd ./appcore && yarn install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init-appcore-data-persistence: cd ./appcore-data-persistence && yarn install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init-ui: cd ./timelog-ui && yarn install && ng build && cd ..
scripts.init-desktop-app: cd ./timelog-desktop-app && yarn install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init-all: npm run init-appcore && npm run init-appcore-data-persistence && npm run init-ui && npm run init-desktop-app
